name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi 7th Birthday Live ＂Sweet Pop Story＂ 新衣装お披露目＆重大発表【#AZKi生誕ライブ2025】 [gdQ4eN9wzZg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: AZKi performs the climax of the song 'Mirai Campanella' during her 3D live concert.
A post-concert POV cutscene where AZKi meets the viewer on a city street at night.

subtitles.original: 連れて行くから
subtitles.english: Because I'll take you with me

subtitles.original: そっと響くカンパネラ
subtitles.english: The Campanella softly ringing

subtitles.original: 新しい未来を感じてる
subtitles.english: I'm feeling a new future

subtitles.original: 怖くたって進むしかないでしょ
subtitles.english: Even if I'm scared, I have to keep going, right?

subtitles.original: 遠くまで
subtitles.english: To the ends of the earth

subtitles.original: 届けこの祈りよ 光となれ
subtitles.english: Reach out, my prayer, and become light

subtitles.original: もっと もっと
subtitles.english: More and more

subtitles.original: 少しずつでもいい「私」という答えを
subtitles.english: Even if it's little by little, give me the answer called 'me'

subtitles.original: もっと
subtitles.english: More

subtitles.original: もっと…
subtitles.english: More...

subtitles.original: 夜空よ教えて
subtitles.english: Night sky, please tell me

subtitles.original: 私の証は
subtitles.english: Whether the proof of my existence

subtitles.original: 輝けるのかな
subtitles.english: Can shine

subtitles.original: 見つけたい 見つけたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to find it, I want to find it

subtitles.original: 誰かの決めたレールは
subtitles.english: The rails determined by someone else

subtitles.original: 苦しくなるだけ
subtitles.english: Only make me suffer

subtitles.original: ねぇ ノイズも力に変えるよ
subtitles.english: Hey, I'll turn even the noise into strength

subtitles.original: ココロに誓う
subtitles.english: I swear it to my heart

subtitles.original: 錆びついた運命の歯車を回そう
subtitles.english: Let's turn the rusted gears of fate

subtitles.original: ほら 着飾った感情は
subtitles.english: Look, these dressed-up emotions

subtitles.original: 脱ぎ捨てるから
subtitles.english: I'm casting them off

subtitles.original: そっと紡ぐシンフォニア
subtitles.english: The symphonia I softly weave

subtitles.original: 叶えたい願いを信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe in the wish I want to come true

subtitles.original: 胸を張って歌うしかないでしょ
subtitles.english: I have to puff out my chest and sing, right?

subtitles.original: 全力で
subtitles.english: With all my might

subtitles.original: やがて希望の歌に変わる日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day it finally turns into a song of hope

subtitles.original: もっと もっと
subtitles.english: More and more

subtitles.original: 悩みながらでいい すべてが宝物
subtitles.english: It's okay to worry, everything is a treasure

subtitles.original: いつの日かこの声を 受け取ってくれたなら
subtitles.english: If one day you receive this voice of mine

subtitles.original: この言葉を君に
subtitles.english: I'll give these words to you

subtitles.original: 「もう大丈夫 一人じゃない」
subtitles.english: 'It's okay now, you're not alone'

subtitles.original: 強い想いを繋ぐよ
subtitles.english: I'll connect these strong feelings

subtitles.original: 一歩踏み出してみた 優しく世界は微笑む
subtitles.english: I took a step forward, and the world smiled kindly

subtitles.original: 高鳴る気持ちに身を任せて
subtitles.english: Entrusting myself to these racing feelings

subtitles.original: さあ行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go

subtitles.original: そっと響くカンパネラ
subtitles.english: The Campanella softly ringing

subtitles.original: 新しい未来を感じてる
subtitles.english: I'm feeling a new future

subtitles.original: 怖くたって進むしかないでしょ
subtitles.english: Even if I'm scared, I have to keep going, right?

subtitles.original: 遠くまで
subtitles.english: To the ends of the earth

subtitles.original: 届けこの祈りよ 光となれ
subtitles.english: Reach out, my prayer, and become light

subtitles.original: もっと もっと
subtitles.english: More and more

subtitles.original: 少しずつでもいい「私」という答えを
subtitles.english: Even if it's little by little, give me the answer called 'me'

subtitles.original: もっと
subtitles.english: More

subtitles.original: もっと…
subtitles.english: More...

subtitles.original: ごめん、待った？
subtitles.english: Sorry, did I keep you waiting?

subtitles.original: ごめんね、ライブ終わった後マネージャーさんに呼ばれちゃって
subtitles.english: Sorry, I was called by my manager after the concert ended.

subtitles.original: もちろん打ち上げもあったけど、君と会うためにキャンセルしたんだからね
subtitles.english: Of course, there was an after-party, but I canceled it just to meet you.

subtitles.original: 改めて、今日はライブに来てくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: Once again, thank you for coming to the concert today.

subtitles.original: アリーナ席の右の方にいたよね？
subtitles.english: You were on the right side of the arena seats, weren't you?

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見つけたよ
subtitles.english: I spotted you clearly.

subtitles.original: 実は、今日花火大会なんだって
subtitles.english: Actually, I heard there's a fireworks festival today.

subtitles.original: こんな都会で花火あがるの、ロマンチックだなぁ
subtitles.english: Fireworks going off in a city like this, it's so romantic, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ねぇ、見て見て！今日のライブのキービジュアルだよ
subtitles.english: Hey, look, look! It's the key visual for today's concert.

subtitles.original: もしかしたら、ここでも流れてたのかな？
subtitles.english: Maybe it was playing here too?

subtitles.original: ついさっきのことだから、ちょっと恥ずかしいよ
subtitles.english: Since it was just a moment ago, it's a bit embarrassing.

subtitles.original: でも、とっても楽しかったなぁ
subtitles.english: But it was so much fun.

subtitles.original: あ、雨？
subtitles.english: Ah, rain?

subtitles.original: どうしよう、私、傘持ってないよ
subtitles.english: What should I do? I don't have an umbrella.

subtitles.original: あ、傘持ってきてくれたんだ
subtitles.english: Ah, you brought an umbrella for me.

subtitles.original: ありがとう、かっこいいじゃん
subtitles.english: Thank you. That's pretty cool of you.

subtitles.original: でも、傘一つしかないってことは、これって…
subtitles.english: But, the fact that there's only one umbrella means, this is...

subtitles.original: 相合傘だよね？
subtitles.english: Sharing an umbrella, right?

subtitles.original: 私、相合傘って初めてで、これってさ…
subtitles.english: It's my first time sharing an umbrella like this, and you know, this is...
